Package com.atakmap.android.widgets

Class LayoutHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.widgets.LayoutHelper
  • public class LayoutHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class designed to make widget (or view) position layouts easier
